name: generate_cc_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fake_credit_card_generator.
Tool description: Select the kind of card you want to generate and let the API generate a new Test Card for you. Using industry standard algorithms, the cards generated will be unique and tied to real instututions, providing a close to real testing number
API description: Generates a fake credit card number using the specified brand and API key.

brand.description: The desired card brand (e.g., 'Visa', 'MasterCard'). Defaults to None.
